document.full_text: roger federer beat novak djokovic 7-6, 6-3, 3-6, 7-6 to reach the french open final where he will face rafael nadal on sunday.
document.title: federer ends djokovic's streak to advance to final
lines_and_colors: roger federer beat novak djokovic 7-6, 6-3, 3-6, 7-6 to reach the french open final where he will face rafael nadal on sunday.
